description: This file defines the Note JPA entity class, representing a note with properties like title, content, tags, creation/update timestamps, and user info. It includes annotations for database mapping and validation constraints.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: JPA entity class representing an individual note with fields for id, title, content, tags, timestamps, and user info.

methods.name: Note
methods.description: Parameterized constructor initializing a note with title, content, tags, and userId; sets creation and update timestamps to current time.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the UUID identifier of the note.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: getTags
methods.description: Returns the tags associated with the note.

methods.name: getCreatedBy
methods.description: Returns the user who created the note.

methods.name: getUpdatedBy
methods.description: Returns the user who last updated the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note.

methods.name: setTags
methods.description: Sets the tags of the note.

methods.name: setUpdatedBy
methods.description: Sets the user who last updated the note.
